source.g: Select Tutorial Chapter:
Installation of the Client App and Host App

3. Using the App for the first time
1. Account Creation
Contents (click to jump to the video tutorial)
2. Profile Creation
2.2 Address Registration (except Anonymous users)
2.2 Address Registration (except Anonymous users)

Select Tutorial Chapter:
Client Profile Registration: Account Creation
1. Open the application
4. Read thru the introductory tutorial or skip to the registration
3. Select your language
2. Accept Application Permissions
5. Select “Register” to register a new Client Account
6. Select and enter your user name (only English letters and numbers)
7. Enter your email (must be different from email used for Host registration,
if you registered for a Host account)
8. Select and enter your password (8 characters minimum, English letters,
numbers and special characters)
9. Check the box to agree to Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
11. Check your email for the OTP, enter it on this page, and click to Verify OTP
10. Click “Create Account” to proceed to email verification step
12. Click the link to proceed to Login
13. Login with your email and password to continue setting up your account
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Client Profile Registration: Select Account Type
1. Log in for the first time
Anonymous: you want to keep your identity hidden from the Hosts
you may submit your ID to PODMAPS, but Hosts will not see
your name or address
3. Select your account type:
2. Read thru the tutorial or skip to enter your information
Individual: you are an individual personal user:
you will have to submit your ID for verification,
Hosts will see your name and address
Company: you are a representativie of a legally regeistered company:
you will have to submit your company registration documents for
verification
4. Click to proceed to enter your information
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Client Profile Registration: Name and Number (except Anonymous)
1. Enter your First and Last Names
3. Click this button to enter your address
2. Enter your phone number
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Client Profile Registration: Address Registration (except Anonymous)
1. From Profile Setup click “Click To Enter Your Address”
4. Try entering your address and see if the system finds exact match
3. Click Next
2. Try the option “Select from Map”
5. If there are no exact matches click to go back
6. Select the button to enter the address manually
7. Custom Location option is now selected
8. Click Next to proceed to custom address (”custom location”) entry
9. Watch the Tutorial Video on Custom Location Entry
11. If you watch Tutorial Video to the end click Next to proceed
or click “Skip” to go to Location Entry directly
12. Custom Location Entry:
- enter your approximate location
- drag the red marker on the map to your exact location
- review the address promted by the sytem, and click Accept to accept
this address as your Custom Address
9. Zoom and crop the photo to the size of your ID, click the check mark at the
top left corner of the screen to accept
Client Profile Registration: ID Verification (except Anonymous)
1. For “ID Verification” you will have to provide photos of your current
valid ID
3. Click “Add” to proceed to take photographs of your ID
2. Select the country that issued your ID, and the type of ID
4. Click on the camera image to take a photo of the front of your ID
5. Allow the application to use the camera (Click “While Using the app”)
6. Click the camera image again to start using the camera
7. Click on the white camera to take a photo
8. Click the check mark to accept the image
10. Repeat for the back side of the image
11. Location Verification: enter the same address as provided on your ID
Select Tutorial Chapter:
12. The following is an example of entering and accepting an addres from the
map application
13. Click to Send the data for review, and wait for your profile approval!
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Client Profile Registration: Wait for Approval and Log in for the first time
1. After you entered your ID information, you need to wait for your profile
to be approved by PODMAP Support staff
3. Click this notification to find out the results of your ID review
(for Anonymous users there is no ID review, but you still need approval
of your profile by our support staff)
2. Once your profile is approved, you will get a push notification
4. Click “Continue” to proceed to your PODMAP app
1.1 Different methods of searching for a Host
1. Find Hosts around you and ask for their permission to use their address for receiving packages

2.2 Pick up a package from a Host

Select Tutorial Chapter:
Host Profile Registration: Account Creation
1. Open the application
4. Read thru the introductory tutorial or skip to the registration
3. Select your language
2. Accept Application Permissions
5. Select “Register” to register a new Host Account
6. Select and enter your user name (only English letters and numbers)
7. Enter your email (must be different from email used for Client registration,
if you registered for a Host account)
8. Select and enter your password (8 characters minimum, English letters,
numbers and special characters)
9. Check the box to agree to Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
11. Check your email for the OTP, enter it on this page, and click to Verify OTP
10. Click “Create Account” to proceed to email verification step
12. Click the link to proceed to Login
13. Login with your email and password to continue setting up your account
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Host Profile Registration: Enter your Basic Information and Service Costs
2. Enter your First, Last Names and your Phone Number
4. Enter what time you are available to receive packages each day of the week:
3. Enter how much you want to charge to receive 1 package
Note: Hosts cannot be Anonymous for the safety of the users
1. Select your account type:
Individual: you are an individual personal user:
you will have to submit your ID for verification,
Clients will see your name
Company: you are a representativie of a legally regeistered company:
you will have to submit your company registration documents for
verification
- select a day of the week from the dropdown menu
- enter the start and end time of your availability that day
- make sure to click the “Add” button to register your availability for that
day of the week
- your availability should become visible in this box
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Host Profile Registration: Address Registration (Enter from the Maps app)
1. From Profile Setup click “Click To Enter Your Address”
4. Try entering your address and see if the system finds exact match
3. Click in this box
2. Try the option “Select from Map”, click “Next”
5. Select the address from the dropdown that matches your address
6. The map displays the address you selected
7. Click this button to accept the address
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Host Profile Registration: Using Custom Location (with pin drop)
1. Let’s review the conditions when using Custom Location is required:
- try entering your address and see if the system finds exact match
- click in the address entry box
- let’s suppose you try to find your address with the “Select from Map”
- if there are no exact matches, you have to go back and use
“Custom Location” functionality to enter your address
2. Select “Custom Location” option and click “Next”
3. Watch the Tutorial Video on Custom Location Entry
4. If you watch Tutorial Video to the end click Next to proceed
or click “Skip” to go to Location Entry directly
5. Custom Location entry procedure:
- enter your approximate location
- zoom in and drag the red marker on the map to your exact location
- review the address promted by the sytem, and click Accept to accept
this address as your Custom Address
9. Zoom and crop the photo to the size of your ID, click the check mark at the
top left corner of the screen to accept
Host Profile Registration: ID Verification
1. For “ID Verification” you will have to provide photos of your current
valid ID
3. Click “Add” to proceed to take photographs of your ID
2. Select the country that issued your ID, and the type of ID
4. Click on the camera image to take a photo of the front of your ID
5. Allow the application to use the camera (Click “While Using the app”)
6. Click the camera image again to start using the camera
7. Click on the white camera to take a photo
8. Click the check mark to accept the image
10. Repeat for the back side of the image
11. Location Verification: enter the same address as provided on your ID
Select Tutorial Chapter:
12. The following is an example of entering and accepting an addres from the
map application
13. Click to Send the data for review, and wait for your profile approval!
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Host Profile Registration: Wait for Approval and Log in for the first time
1. After you entered your ID information, you need to wait for your profile
to be approved by PODMAP Support staff
3. Click this notification to find out the results of your ID review
2. Once your profile is approved, you will get a push notification
4. Click “Continue” to proceed to your PODMAP app
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Host Profile Registration: Skip STRIPE Express Account Onboarding
2. If you select the “Skip” option, the following happens:
At first log in Hosts MUST take action on the STRIPE Account Onboarding. Without this action on this item Clients will NOT
be able to connect to the Host.
1. For STRIPE Onboarding you MUST click one of the two buttons:
“Skip”: you will not register with STRIPE. You accept full
responsibility for your transactions with Clients.
Result: you will only be able to receive payments in Cash
“Start”: you will have to submit your bank account information to
STRIPE (a leading international payments processing company).
Result: you will be able to accept Credit Card payments from Clients
- you must read the Warning regarding accepting self-responsibility for
all Cash-based transactions with Clients
- make sure to click the “Accept” button to confirm that you accept
self-responsibility for all Cash-based transactions with Clients
3. You are now ready to accept Connect Requests from Clients, and
receive payments for Packages (Cash payments only)!
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Host Profile Registration: Perform STRIPE Express Account Onboarding
2. If you select the “Start” option, the following happens:
At first log in Hosts MUST take action on the STRIPE Account Onboarding. Without this action on this item Clients will NOT
be able to connect to the Host.
1. For STRIPE Onboarding you MUST click one of the two buttons:
“Skip”: you will not register with STRIPE. You accept full
responsibility for your transactions with Clients.
Result: you will only be able to receive payments in Cash
“Start”: you will have to submit your bank account information to
STRIPE (a leading international payments processing company).
Result: you will be able to accept Credit Card payments from Clients
- you must read thru the basic STRIPE Account Onboarding tutorial,
confirm your email, provide your phone number to STRIPE (for SMS OTP)

trans-unit.source: Please click here to read instructions from STRIPE
Please click here to read instructions from STRIPE
Please click here to read instructions from STRIPE

source.g: - the rest of the Onboarding is done by STRIPE (payment processing firm)
3. You are now ready to accept Connect Requests from Clients, and
receive payments for Packages in Cash and and via Credit Cards!
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Client Requesting Host Permission to use Address for Package Delivery
Client App
Host App
1. Click Host Icon
2. Review Host Availability
3. Click “Send Request”
4. Host gets notification,
click on the notification
5. Notifications list opens
6. Click to accept request
7. Client gets Push
Notification, click it
8. Notifications list open
9. Go to Home screen
10. Menu -> “My Hosts”
11. Confirm Host added
12. Menu -> “My Clients”
13. Confirm Client added
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Client searching Hosts: Different Methods
To use Host Address for Package Shipments Clients must first
find a Host, and request his Permission to use his address for
shipment of the Client packages
1. Method 1: Select from the map around your location
click on an icon representing a Host
drag and zoom the map around your location to see Hosts, identified
as yellow icons on your map
2. Method 2: Look at the location far away from you
click on this box to go to the Host search screen
enter the radius in miles around the search location to search for Hosts
inside of the search radius
review Host availability by the day of the week
click “Send Request” to ask Host’s permission to use their address
enter the search location in the map search application
specify other search criteria, such as Host Rating or Host Fee
click “Apply” to display the Hosts that match the search criteria
3.1 if Host hasn’t set up Delivery Charges chat with Host and ask to set up Delivery Charges
2. Client Picks up Package from Host
1. Client Creates a Package, assigns it to Host, Host informs the Client when the Package is received
5. OR Client Pays from Credit Cart to Host for Package
5. OR Client Pays from Credit Cart to Host for Package
4. Client Pays Cash to Host for Package
3. OR Client Requests Host to Deliver Package
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Package Transactions
Package transactions consist of the following:
(click to jump to the video tutorial)
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Client Creates Package, Assigns to Host, Host confirms Delivery
Client App
Host App
1. Select “Packages”
2. Click “+” to add Package
3. Select Package Category
4. Enter Courier Company
5. Enter Expected Delvery
Date and Time (optional)
6. Click “Add Package”
7. Assign package to Host
8. Host gets Notification,
click, open Notifications
9. Click to accept package
10. Open package details
11. Check the box when
package arrives
12. Check the box when
ready for Client pick up
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Client Picks up Package on his own (go to the Host location)
Client App
Host App
1. Client selects “Packages”
2. Check box “Self Pickup”
3. Click “Confirm”
4. Host gets notification
5. When Client picks up the package, he checks this box
6. Click “Confirm”
8. Open Package details
7. Host gets Notification,
click, open Notifications
9. Check the box, confirm
package pick up
10. Click “Confirm”
11. Client refreshes package
details, scrolls to the bottom
12. Review the details of the payments and the sum
1. Host selects a package
from Home screen, click it
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Client Requests Delivery, but Host Delivery Charges not set up
Client App
Host App
1. Client opens the package
2. Check box “Delivery”
4. Check how much Host
charges for Delivery (Rs. 0
means Host hasn’t set up
delivery charges)
3. Enter address for delivery, and name of receiver
5. Error message comes up.
You must contact Host
8. Open Chat Windows.
Chat with Client
7. Chat notification arrives
1. Host opens the package
6. Open Chat Window.
Ask Host to set up delivery
charges
9. Setup Delivery Charges
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Client Requests Host to Deliver a Package to Client Location
Client App
Host App
1. Client opens the package
2. Check box “Delivery”
4. Check how much Host
charges for Delivery (if Charges > 0, can proceed)
3. Enter address for delivery, and name of receiver
5. Host gets notification.
Click it, open package info
8. Client is ready to move to Payment page
7. Client must confirm delivery, when he gets the package
1. Host opens the package
6. Check box “Delivery in progress”. Enter expected delivery date and time
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Cash Payment
Client App
Host App
1. Review the details of the payments and the sum
2. Click “Pay” to proceed to payment amount review
3. Click “Select Payment Method” button
4. Only Cash payment is available for Hosts who have not set up STRIPE
5. Pay Cash to your Host and click the button “Make the Payment”
7. Please leave a review
6. Host must confirm Cash payment by checking this box. PODMAP will not be responsible for Cash transactions
8. Please leave a review
Select Tutorial Chapter:
To Be Completed
4. Set up STRIPE Express Account
1. Set up Host Storage Charges / Free Storage Duration
6. Configure the Max number of packages you accept simultaneously
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Account Settings: Host
7. Update your Name, Phone Number and Password
7. Update your Name, Phone Number and Password
Account Settings Menu opens access to the following functionality:
(click to jump to the video tutorial)
2. Set up Delivery Charges
3. Change your Receiving Address
5. Change your Availability Days and Hours
Select Tutorial Chapter:
Account Settings: Hosts setting up Delivery Charge
By default, Hosts do not have Delivery Charge set up.
The consequence of this is that Clients cannot request Package delievery for a Host who didn’t set up his Delivery Charges.
1. Select the Hamburger Menu at the top left corner
If a Host is willing to provide Package Delivery services for his clients, he should set up his Delivery Charges following the procedure described below:
2. Scroll down the menu to “Settings”
3. You are now in Account Settings Menu
4. Select “Package Charges” from the menu
5. Enter the price for delivery of each package to Clients in the window
6. Click “Save Changes”
Select Tutorial Chapter:
The End
